title: THIS NEEKO NERF WAS NEVER MENTIONED IN THE PATCH NOTES?!?!
body:
So with this upcoming patch {{champion:518}}'s W Shapesplitter, here's what it says:

W: SHAPESPLITTER
Passive: Every third basic attack resonates with spiritual energy, dealing bonus magic damage and briefly increasing Neekoâ€™s movement speed.

Cool. And dealing bonus magic damage on her next basic attack includes turrets, epic monsters, champions and minions. ANYTHING she can basic attack. But now her empowered basic attack no longer deals extra damage to turrets?! 

This is huge. Especially for Neeko's who want to hard shove, harass under turret and get easy plates. This takes away all her sieging. 
Not to mention, she doesn't even get the movement speed buff. 

Not sure if this is a bug or a nerf but this needs to be fixed.

replies.body: As a neeko main, I didn't like it, but I don't think it was an unfair nerf.  Just please either patch it up as a bug or put it into the patch notes please. As a side note I really like the 2->3 second w buff and the 20% magic pen passive buff on the pbe for neeko right now.

She isn't meant to be a laner, she was meant to be a jungler at the start, but the extra damage from that passive made her overwhelming in mid lane,  to be honest the nerf was understandable, she isn't supposed to be the "pushy" kind of champion.

She does technically have one jungle feature: Q. It repeats 3 times on large monsters. Every camp has one. In lane you have to succeed in killing something, or hitting a champ.
This big of a nerf and it isn't mentioned at all in the patch notes.
I don't care if its in the patch notes or not, they may have forgot to list it in there, idk.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Apex,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7ET3AA9Z,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-10T22:48:35.751+0000)
>
> She isn't meant to be a laner, she was meant to be a jungler at the start, but the extra damage from that passive made her overwhelming in mid lane,  to be honest the nerf was understandable, she isn't supposed to be the "pushy" kind of champion.

1) She was NEVER overwhelming. She capped at a 49.1% Win rate. She's obvious as hell.

2) There are about 40 champions who have turret enhanced damage, most of whom really weren't meant to be siegers.

For example:

{{champion:22}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:86}} Shred turrets. Garen's Q hits turrets, giving him a legitimate Demolish every time it's up. Ashe's Q rapid fire destroys turrets. Diana's on hit passive + Lich Bane almost 1 shots turrets.

{{champion:37}} Gets to on proc turrets with Q and her passive.

{{champion:142}} Gets to on proc use her passive on turrets.

I can go on and on....

There are far more turret destroyers than there are turret immune skills. And almost all of them have competent, carrying damage kits with high success rates too.

Pushing turrets was literally the one area she's good at. It works hand in hand with her highest win rate build: {{item:3115}} {{item:3100}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3165}} {{item:3089}} . Other builds don't do NEAR enough agency.
She was not meant to be a jungle there is 0 reason for this.......
It is most lilely a bug. If you stack it up beforehand you will only do the empowered auto animation, without doing extra damage
Yeah I noticed this as well, but it does seem intentional like a caitlyn headshot.
